data.name: Torque Drift - Jhonnattan Castro Driver Car
data.detailed_description: Pre-built real world pro drift car.
data.about_the_game: Pre-built real world pro drift car.
data.short_description: Pre-built real world pro drift car.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9400F or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB (GeForce GTX 970 / amd RX 5500 XT)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
